connect20/ip_based_payment_method.name: connect20/Ip_Based_Payment_Method

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/ip_based_payment_method.description: Module will allow to restrict payment methods based on customers Ip address.So It will be very useful in case you testing checkout process and need method like 'Check/Money Order' for you.
